titleInfo.title: E. Roger Jones, Sr. Post Card Album Photos, circa 1906

mods.note: The E. Roger Jones, Sr. Post Card Album Photos are copy prints of postcards illustrating scenes in Alexandria, La.; Biloxi, Miss.; Gloster, Miss.; New Orleans, La.; and Plaquemine, La.
mods.abstract: The E. Roger Jones, Sr. Post Card Album Photos are copy prints of postcards illustrating scenes in Alexandria, La.; Biloxi, Miss.; Gloster, Miss.; New Orleans, La.; and Plaquemine, La.
mods.accessCondition: Please submit an LSU Special Collections reference ticket at https://askus.lib.lsu.edu/special for any questions or comments about this digital object.
